subject: Presidents Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Hideki Matsuyama, 21, drew praise for his smooth play at the Presidents Cup, but the United States took an 11 ½-6 ½ lead over the International team.
snippet: Hideki Matsuyama, 21, drew praise for his smooth play at the Presidents Cup, but the United States took an 11 ½-6 ½ lead over the International team.
